title: League Client Wont open
body:
I recently Factory reset my computer,  And ever since when I redownloaded league and opened it it would say "Repairing" for about 5 miniutes, Then when it was done repairing, it wouldn't open. the League of Legends symbol would come up for a few seconds but nothing else. Please help. 
heres the Rads_user_kernel notes

replies.body: This is most likely a simple lack of permissions issue. Basically, League is trying to get access to certain files but your OS may be blocking it, which then causes this error. Make sure you've got all of the right admin rights assigned to League following the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions). Let me know if that doesn't help for some reason!
